mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_resume( resume_cd, login_id, resume_name, resume_regdate, resume_modidate )VALUES( (SELECT CONCAT('resume_cd_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(substring(resume.resume_cd, 11)),0)+1,4,'0')) AS resumeCdOrder FROM tb_resume resume ORDER BY resumeCdOrder), #{loginId}, #{resumeName}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_personal( personal_cd, resume_cd, personal_korname, personal_engname, personal_birthdate, personal_gender, personal_phone, personal_cellphone, personal_email, personal_sns, personal_addr ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('personal_cd_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(substring(personal.personal_cd, 13)),0)+1,4,'0')) AS personalCdOrder FROM tb_resume_personal personal ORDER BY personalCdOrder), (SELECT CONCAT('resume_cd_', max(substring(resume.resume_cd, 11))) FROM tb_resume resume), #{personalKorname}, #{personalEngname}, #{personalBirthdate}, #{personalGender}, #{personalPhone}, #{personalCellphone}, #{personalEmail}, #{personalSns}, #{personalAddr} )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_highschool( highschool_cd, resume_cd, highschool_name, highschool_category, highschool_begindate, highschool_enddate ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('highschool_cd_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(substring(highschool.highschool_cd, 15)),0)+1,4,'0')) AS highschoolCdOrder FROM tb_resume_highschool highschool ORDER BY highschoolCdOrder), (SELECT CONCAT('resume_cd_', max(substring(resume.resume_cd, 11))) FROM tb_resume resume), #{highschoolName}, #{highschoolCategory}, #{highschoolBegindate}, #{highschoolEnddate} )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_university( university_cd, resume_cd, university_name, university_category, university_begindate, university_enddate, university_major, university_dmajorminor, university_dmajorminor_name, university_credit ) VALUES
( (SELECT CONCAT('university_cd_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(substring(university.university_cd, 15)),0)+1,4,'0')) AS universityCdOrder FROM tb_resume_university university ORDER BY universityCdOrder), (SELECT CONCAT('resume_cd_', max(substring(resume.resume_cd, 11))) FROM tb_resume resume), #{universityName}, #{universityCategory}, #{universityBegindate}, #{universityEnddate}, #{universityMajor}, #{universityDmajorminor}, #{universityDmajorminorName}, #{universityCredit} )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_family( resume_cd, family_relation, family_name, family_birthdate, family_education, family_job, family_cohabit ) VALUES
( (), (SELECT CONCAT('resume_cd_', max(substring(resume.resume_cd, 11))) FROM tb_resume resume), #{item.familyRelation}, #{item.familyName}, #{item.familyBirthdate}, #{item.familyEducation}, #{item.familyJob}, #{item.familyCohabit} )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_militaryservice( militaryservice_cd, resume_cd, militaryservice_state, militaryservice_group, militaryservice_level, militaryservice_branch, militaryservice_begindate, militaryservice_enddate ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('militaryservice_cd_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(substring(militaryservice.militaryservice_cd, 20)),0)+1,4,'0')) AS militaryserviceCdOrder FROM tb_resume_militaryservice militaryservice ORDER BY militaryserviceCdOrder), (SELECT CONCAT('resume_cd_', max(substring(resume.resume_cd, 11))) FROM tb_resume resume), #{militaryserviceState}, #{militaryserviceGroup}, #{militaryserviceLevel}, #{militaryserviceBranch}, #{militaryserviceBegindate}, #{militaryserviceEnddate} )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_certificate( certificate_cd, resume_cd, certificate_name, certificate_host, certificate_grade, certificate_regnum, certificate_begindate, certificate_enddate ) VALUES

INSERT INTO tb_resume_etc( etc_cd, resume_cd, etc_title, etc_content, etc_begindate, etc_enddate ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('etc_cd_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(substring(etc.etc_cd, 8)),0)+1,4,'0')) AS etcCdOrder FROM tb_resume_etc etc ORDER BY etcCdOrder), (SELECT CONCAT('resume_cd_', max(substring(resume.resume_cd, 11))) FROM tb_resume resume), #{etcTitle}, #{etcContent}, #{etcBegindate}, #{etcEnddate} )
mapper.select: SELECT resume_cd as resumeCd, login_id as loginId, resume_name as resumeName, resume_regdate as resumeRegdate, resume_modidate as resumeModidate FROM tb_resume

SELECT p.resume_cd as resumeCd, p.personal_korname as personalKorname, p.personal_engname as personalEngname, p.personal_birthdate as personalBirthdate, p.personal_gender as personalGender, p.personal_phone as personalPhone, p.personal_cellphone as personalCellphone, p.personal_email as personalEmail, p.personal_sns as personalSns, p.personal_addr as personalAddr FROM tb_resume_personal p
WHERE p.resume_cd = #{resumeCd}
